mapper.select: select distinct category_ids from t_planning_category_item c left join t_planning_band b on (c.planning_band_id = b.id) ${ ew.customSqlSegment}

SELECT s.`name`, s.`brand`, s.`brand_name`, s.`year`, s.`year_name`, s.`season`, s.`season_name`, b.`month`, b.`month_name`, b.`sex`, b.`sex_name`, b.band_code, b.band_name, b.devt_type, b.devt_type_name, b.channel, b.channel_name, sd.`status` as sd_status, sd.confirm_status as sd_confirm_status, c.* FROM t_planning_season s, t_planning_band b, t_planning_category_item c left JOIN t_sample_design sd on (sd.planning_category_item_id = c.id and sd.del_flag='0') WHERE s.id = c.planning_season_id AND b.id = c.planning_band_id AND c.del_flag = '0'
${ ew.customSqlSegment.startsWith("WHERE")?ew.customSqlSegment.replace("WHERE","AND "):ew.customSqlSegment}
select DISTINCT designer_id as user_id, designer as name from t_planning_category_item s where company_code = #{companyCode} AND del_flag = '0' and designer_id !='' and designer_id is not null

select ${ew.sqlSelect} from t_planning_band b ,t_planning_category_item ci where b.id=ci.planning_band_id and b.del_flag ='0' and ci.del_flag ='0' and ci.prod_category is not null and ci.prod_category <> '' and b.band_code is not null and b.band_code <> ''
${ ew.customSqlSegment.startsWith("WHERE")?ew.customSqlSegment.replace("WHERE","AND "):ew.customSqlSegment}

SELECT ci.id, ci.prod_category, ci.design_no, ci.his_design_no, ci.price, ci.seasonal, ci.style_pic, ci.continuation_point, ci.designer, ci.designer_id, b.band_code, sd.style_no FROM t_planning_band b JOIN t_planning_category_item ci ON ( b.id = ci.planning_band_id ) LEFT JOIN t_sample_design sd ON ( sd.planning_category_item_id = ci.id ) WHERE b.del_flag = '0' AND ci.del_flag = '0' and ci.prod_category is not null and ci.prod_category <> '' and b.band_code is not null and b.band_code <> ''
${ ew.customSqlSegment.startsWith("WHERE")?ew.customSqlSegment.replace("WHERE","AND "):ew.customSqlSegment}
